function.description:
Carries out the Put REST request. Returns response from server.
The body for request can be one of the following types:
* XML (XmlNode) * JSON (Object) * String [with custom content type] * REST multipart body (bodyCreate() function)
The response.body can be one of the following types:
* XML (XmlNode) * JSON (Object) * String
Options:
* timeout - processing timeout in ms (default = 5000) * proxyhost - proxy server URL * proxyport - port of the proxy server * user - user name for server authentication * pass - password for server authentication * insecure - if set to true, insecure SSL connections and transfers are allowed (default = false) * headers - the object of name and value pair strings added as a parts of HTTP request header
The proxy and server authentication options can be combined as follows:
proxyhost proxyhost+proxyport proxyhost+proxyport+user+pass user+pass
